segments.text: I see an ordinary kitchen scene, but something is very wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, water sheeting down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems totally unaware of the deluge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate with such concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in the growing puddle, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing that she hasn't felt the water splashing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the potential water damage to those nice cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The constant stream just keeps getting wider and wider.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could become a serious problem very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to turn off that faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even knows the drain isn't working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bizarre tableau of domestic routine meeting impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
